title: Can we buff lethality items back to 20 rather than 15?
body:
Its kind of stupid how a single 1100 gold item (tabi) gives 30 armor + the broken passive, which is enough to completely negate 2 full lethality items worth of the lethality stat that cost over 5k gold combined (say EoN + ghostblade).

Lethality is just beyond shit atm.

replies.body:
If we could also make Edge of Night not useless that'd be gr8 as well. There's no point in building it over Maw.

"Maw isn't for assassins, so here's Edge of Night."

*Proceeds to gut Edge of Night because of Varus and Jhin*

Jhin was meant to build crit anyway...

Got nothing on Varus.
Full Lethality Zed returns.....how bout no?
